reviewText: Tom Mann recently passed away, and bass fishing lost one of it's all-time best!  These are tips from one of the best big bass fishermen of all time. I you fish Lake Eufaula on the Alabama-Georgia border (or just want some fantastic tips on catching big bass from the master) this is a must-have DVD!

Overall, it was pretty good. Some things were kind of hokie and there wasn't enough time spent on river techniques. Most of the topics covered bass fishing on lakes in Georgia, but the principles seemed sound.
Please don't waste your money on this... lame and very outdated!
